resources.string: I\'ve read and accepted terms and conditions...

Main screen: You can see your profile and the amount of days, you still have until your tariff will expire. Also you can choose to start a poker table simulation by clicking on the "Play" button. You can also change your profile and your tariff by clicking on the "Profile" button. You can browse instructions how to use PokerKing application by clicking on "Help" button. If you encounter an error, or if you wish to provide us feedback use the "Feedback" button. By clicking on the "Back" button you may return to the login screen.

Poker table screen: Here you can simulate a real Texas Holdem match, and our application will calculate the odds for you! If you wish to attach a specific card to your hand or on the table, simply click on the card and card selection screen will appear. The calculated probabilities of win are shown immediately on the screen. By clicking on the "Back" button you may return to the title screen.

User profile screen: You can see your profile picture and username here as well as amount of the days you still have left to use current cloud computation power. If you wish to lower or increase the computation power used when calculating your simulations, you can pick different tarif. Basic tariff ofers you simple computation power of the fourth core processor. Advanced tariff provides you with stronger and much faster power of two four core processors. Finally Proffessional tariff gives you the massive amount of 5 four core processor power which calculates your simulations in a blink of an eye.

Feedback screen: This screen provides you an option to help us improve Poker King application by sending us your opinions or advices. Also you can report any error you will encounter during usage of Poker King application.
